R Econ Visual Library contains graphs created in R to explore impact evaluation data sets and display results.
The Rmarkdown scripts and data sets used to create the Library's graphs are stored in the [R Econ Visual Library GitHub repository](https://github.com/worldbank/r-econ-visual-library).
